name: A Path of Resilience - Aprbhs - Rose House - LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: A Path of Resilience - Aprbhs - Rose House - LLC is a Clinic/Center, Adult Mental Health provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $48.7M in Medicaid payments across 60K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $48.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
